title: Drawing, "Design for a Punch Goblet", 1943
medium: Photostat, graphite on cream wove paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 279
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: GOBELET A PUNCH/DIAMETRE 9 cms 1/2/HAUTEUR 6 cms 1/2; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/43; verso: [mathematical notations in graphite]
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Flaring bowl with two applied wavy bands at rim raised on an inverted flaring foot with rim. Connection between bowl and foot unclear, possibly band of another material. Internal screw suggested in graphite. To right of bowl rim, profile section in graphite depicting protruding bands. Framing lines at top, right, and left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Punch Goblet", 1943.
1943. Photostat, graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-28.
